name: Ash
description:
This is Ash, lethal and elusive. Ash can remain unseen, but his effects on the battlefield can be felt by all. Keep an eye out, Tenno.
_Lotus_

name: Ash Prime
description:

name: Atlas
description:
This is Atlas, the brawler, the strong. Moving mountains is no easy task, Tenno. Atlas endures.
_Lotus_

name: Banshee
description:
This is Banshee, stealthy and ranged. No one puts Banshee in a corner, Tenno. The element of surprise is in her favor.
_Lotus_

name: Banshee Prime
description:
This is Banshee, stealthy and ranged. No one puts Banshee in a corner, Tenno. The element of surprise is in her favor.
_Lotus_
location: Axi C3, (Lith B5, Neo K2, Neo S7), Meso B2, Neo B

name: Chroma
description:
This is Chroma, an ancient legend, master of the elements. When all the land is in ruins, Tenno, only Chroma will remain.
_Lotus_

name: Ember
description:
This is Ember, destructive and deadly. Ember's presence on the battlefield is devastating. Mind the heat, Tenno.
_Lotus_
